Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a walk-off single in the 9th inning to win the game for the Philadelphia Phillies
Bryce Harper hit a two-run home run in the 6th inning
Mark Vientos hit a pair of two-run homers for the Mets
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos expressed his excitement about winning the game for the Phillies
Bryce Harper praised the team's never-die mentality
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second postseason game between the NL East rivals
The Phillies are now even in the NLDS at one game apiece
Others: The game was played at Citizens Bank Park
The Mets' starting pitcher was Luis Severino
